name: imodeljs-core
//private: NOTE: This 'root' package is private. It is never published

scripts.preinstall: echo ERROR: use 'rush install' instead && exit 1
scripts.test: npm run test-no-gui && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test-no-gui: npm run test:bentley && npm run test:geometry && npm run test:clients && npm run test:backend && npm run test:example-code-snippets && npm run test:example-code-app && npm run test:ecschema-metadata
scripts.test-integration: npm run test:clients-integration && npm run test:clients-backend-integration && npm run test:backend-integration && npm run test:frontend-integration
scripts.test:presentation: npm run test:presentation-common && npm run test:presentation-backend && npm run test:presentation-frontend && npm run test:presentation-components && npm run test:presentation-integration
scripts.test:ui: npm run test:ui-core && npm run test:ui-components && npm run test:ui-ninezone && npm run test:ui-framework

//dependencies: NOTE: dependencies will be empty here and instead specified in each package.
//devDependencies: NOTE: devDependencies will be empty here and instead specified in each package.
